alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 21 at 1:29PM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM MDT /noon CDT/ Friday to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust are likely. Reduced visibilities associated with blowing dust may magnify already difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
